basics.name: Mikko Vatanen
basics.label: Developer, Wind Fanatic
basics.summary: I'm experienced software developer and open source enthusiast. Learning, teaching, inventing and building new things keeps me always motivated. My skills are mostly on technical side of software development, but have also experience with teaching, communications and really enjoy doing various types of work. Non-professional interest include variety of fun sports and musical activities. Being a nerd is not always easy, but knowledge is what makes a happy nerd! |-(:-)

work.summary: Digital Preservation Services of The National Digital Library of Finland, a national project for long term preservation and access of Finnish cultural and research data. This project brings together many organisations from wide range of knowledge and expertise, together aiming to bring information available for everyone.

Distributed workflows, storage middleware, data validation, web development
Quality assurance, test and delivery automation
